title: Italy : largest rivers in 2018 , by length
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Rivers In Italy, and Lenght in kilometers in each Rivers In Italy on the y axis.
The maximum Lenght in kilometers 652.0 is found at Rivers In Italy Po and the minimum is found at Reno where Rivers In Italy is 211.0.
The highest Rivers In Italy Po has 441.0 more Lenght in kilometers than the lowest Rivers In Italy Reno.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Rivers In Italy, and Lenght in kilometers in each Rivers In Italy on the y axis.
Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers and Reno has the lowest Lenght in kilometers.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Rivers In Italy, and Lenght in kilometers in each Rivers In Italy on the y axis.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Lenght in kilometers for 10 number of Rivers In Italys.
The Lenght in kilometers is appeared to be the highest at Rivers In Italy Po and lowest at Rivers In Italy Reno.
There is a difference of 441.0 between the maximum Rivers In Italy Po and minimum Rivers In Italy Reno.
The Rivers In Italy Po has the highest Lenght in kilometers, followed by Adige, and Tevere. Down to the Rivers In Italy Reno which is the lowest.
The lowest value 211.0 at Reno is almost 2.0 times smaller than the average value 325.6.
The Lenght in kilometers is 3256.0 if we add up values of all Rivers In Italys.
